Use recycled paper for invitations: Instead of traditional paper invitations, consider using recycled paper made from recycled materials. This not only reduces waste but also helps support eco-friendly initiatives.
Opt for organic flowers: Choose locally grown flowers that are organic and free from harmful chemicals. This not only supports local farmers but also reduces the carbon footprint of transportation.
Choose a green venue: Look for a venue that is eco-friendly and has implemented sustainable practices. This could include using renewable energy sources, reducing water usage, and recycling programs.
Serve plant-based food: Consider serving a plant-based meal for your wedding reception. This not only reduces the carbon footprint of the food but also supports a healthy and sustainable diet.
Use reusable or biodegradable decorations: Instead of single-use decorations, opt for reusable or biodegradable options. This not only reduces waste but also supports a more sustainable future.
